extracted_playbook.title: Enable Multi-Factor Authentication for Administrator Accounts
extracted_playbook.description: Enable multi-factor authentication (MFA) for Azure Active Directory (AD) Global Administrators to secure cloud-based accounts and prevent unauthorized access.

extracted_playbook.title: Assign Administrator Roles Using Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
extracted_playbook.description: Use Azure AD's built-in administrator roles instead of the Global Administrator account to limit overly permissive privileges and practice the principle of 'Least Privilege'.

extracted_playbook.title: Enable Unified Audit Log (UAL)
extracted_playbook.description: Enable the Unified Audit Log in the Security and Compliance Center to investigate and search for potentially malicious actions within O365.

extracted_playbook.title: Enable Multi-Factor Authentication for All Users
extracted_playbook.description: Enable multi-factor authentication (MFA) for all users to protect data and prevent unauthorized access.

extracted_playbook.condition: Does the organization require legacy email clients?

extracted_playbook.title: Inventory Users Requiring Legacy Protocols
extracted_playbook.description: Inventory users who require legacy email clients and protocols, and limit access to those protocols using Azure AD Conditional Access policies.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Legacy Protocol Authentication
extracted_playbook.description: Disable legacy protocol authentication at the tenant or user level to reduce the attack surface.

extracted_playbook.title: Enable Alerts for Suspicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Create and enable alerts within the Security and Compliance Center to notify administrators of abnormal events, such as logins from suspicious locations and accounts exceeding sent email thresholds.

extracted_playbook.title: Integrate Logs with Existing SIEM Tool
extracted_playbook.description: Integrate and correlate O365 logs with existing log management and monitoring solutions to detect and correlate anomalous activity.
